Sprint 1.goal: Identify requirements for marketing copy generation, image generation, and social media publishing.

tasks.task_description: Research existing platforms and gather insights on features, user experience, and pricing models.
Document functional specifications for copy generation, image generation, and social media publishing.
Create user stories for each component of the platform, focusing on user goals and functionalities needed.
Decide on the technology stack needed for backend, frontend, and integration of AI components.

Sprint 2.goal: Create the design and architecture of the platform based on requirements gathered.

tasks.task_description: Create wireframes and mockups for the user interface.
Outline the major components of the platform including AI modules, database, and frontend.
Design the database schema to manage user data, marketing content, and analytics.
Draft the API design for services required in the platform.

Sprint 3.goal: Develop core features of the platform including marketing copy generation, image generation, and social media publishing functionalities.

tasks.task_description: Develop the AI model for generating images based on input descriptors.
Develop the AI model to generate marketing copy using NLP techniques.
Implement APIs for posting generated content to social media platforms.
Create a comprehensive testing plan for all core features to ensure functionality and quality.

Sprint 4.goal: Test all developed features to ensure they meet the requirements and are free of defects.

tasks.task_description: Execute unit tests on each feature to ensure functionality meets specifications.
Conduct integration testing across components to ensure they work together smoothly.
Gather feedback from a small group of users to validate usability and functionality.
Address any issues discovered during testing to improve the platform's stability.

Sprint 5.goal: Prepare the platform for deployment and monitor its launch.

tasks.task_description: Ensure everything is ready for deployment including server setup and configuration.
Deploy the platform and monitor the launch process for any immediate issues.
Monitor system performance and user feedback closely after launch.
Complete user manuals, API documentation, and developer guides for the platform.
